verses.name: Romans 11:4
verses.text: But what saith the answer of God unto him? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men, who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal.

verses.name: Romans 11:5
verses.text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace.

verses.name: Romans 11:6
verses.text: And if by grace, then is it no more of works: otherwise grace is no more grace. But if it be of works, then is it no more grace: otherwise work is no more work.
